    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes all windows. Creates Parent objects, which load paths to proper .fxml files, creates Scene object for every window and applies them stylesheer (.css file). Also creates Stage object for every window and set them proper Scene objects, titles, and icons. Loads every needed controllers (buttons, textFields, etc.) from all .fxml files. Configures item table showed in one of main windows and fill them with items loaded from data base through DBController object. Configures and sets proper actions to buttons. Finally, shows the first window.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - first scene, created by the platform itself
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - general protection from exceptions

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Called ath the end of the program, closes EntityManagerFactory object from used DBController object.
        Overrides:
        stop in class javafx.application.Application

      • refreshTableView

        public void refreshTableView(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Item> tableView,
                             javafx.scene.Scene scene)
